headline: Is Freeport-McMoRan Still Attractive After a 25% Rally and Strong Copper Optimism?
summary: Investors may be wondering if Freeport McMoRan is still a smart way to gain exposure to copper and long term commodity demand, or if most of the upside is already priced in. The stock has been on a strong run lately, up 4.8% over the last week, 18.0% over the past month, and 25.1% year to date, adding to a 105.5% gain over five years. These moves have come as investors refocus on copper's role in electrification and infrastructure, with headlines around supply constraints and long dated...
